highlights: Researching causal representation learning as means of improving robustness and generalisation capabilities of Neural Network models
Designing and building novel causal disentanglement models as well as implementing and testing existing state-of-the-art models in the field
work.name: Simula Research Laboratory
Firi AS
highlights: Built, trained, and tested a variety of NN architectures, including bespoke Transformers and Attention-based Graph Neural Networks for predictive risk modelling
Designed and implemented from scratch a microservice backend architecture to underpin efficient and scalable data extraction, processing, and feature engineering

work.name: AIUS
highlights: Designed and implemented ML-based document and sequence classification models, and pitched these to our non-technical customers
Built back-end API and database schemas for our document management software, using Apollo GraphQL and MongoDB

work.name: Techspert
highlights: Developed a collection of multilabel classifiers using Tensorflow / Keras, for categorising and filtering incoming company emails
Built pre-processing pipeline to clean, anonymise, and build feature vectors from training data

work.name: University of Cambridge
highlights: Developed and modified lattice-based RNN models for improved speech recognition confidence scores
Designed and built automated system for grade-appropriate feedback to English learners. Later released as part of the app "Sandi"

volunteer.summary: Project leader in collaboration with Cambridge-based charity REMAP to upgrade remote-controlled archery turret for users with movement disabilities

awards.title: King's Scholar
